# Sample Project

This is a sample project for testing code2pdf and code2txt tools.

## Features

- Multiple programming languages
- Documentation files
- Configuration files
- Test files

## Structure

```
sample_project/
├── src/
│   ├── main.py
│   ├── utils.js
│   └── app.java
├── docs/
│   └── README.md
├── tests/
│   └── test_main.py
└── config/
    └── settings.json
```
